languages.text: "По манере общения, по несдержанности — разносол настолько их ошеломляет, что бедняги теряют контроль. Еще ряженых часто пугает упавшая на слабосильные плечи ответственность, и они стараются держаться рядом с настоящей знатью, подражать высоким манерам. При поиске более всего стоит обратить внимание на отдельные группы, в которых уже завязался разговор — испуганный притворщик наверняка попытается спрятаться за чужие спины... Это все, что я знаю, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}".
languages.translation_comment: Lizzy (можно пореактить компаньонами с сильным мнением по поводу свободы в руках черни)

traits.locale_text: "По манере общения, по несдержанности — разносол настолько их ошеломляет, что бедняги теряют контроль. Что еще?.. Некоторые из них становятся необычайно... жестокими, вплоть до издевательств над слугами. Мне кажется, так они мстят за причиненное им зло, ведь на время пряток им одалживаются не только костюмы, но и полномочия дворян. А свобода в руках черни порой хуже преступления".

languages.translation_comment: Lizzy (можно пореактить компаньонами с сильным мнением по поводу свободы в руках черни)

languages.text: "By the way they talk, by their lack of restraint — the unfamiliar delicacies overwhelm them so much that they lose control. Impostors are often scared of the responsibility that has fallen on their weak shoulders, and they try to stay close to the real nobles and imitate their rarefied manners. During the hunt, it is most worthwhile to pay attention to separate groups where conversation has already started — a frightened impostor will probably try to hide behind other people's backs... That's all I know, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."
languages.original_text: "По манере общения, по несдержанности — разносол настолько их ошеломляет, что бедняги теряют контроль. Еще ряженых часто пугает упавшая на слабосильные плечи ответственность, и они стараются держаться рядом с настоящей знатью, подражать высоким манерам. При поиске более всего стоит обратить внимание на отдельные группы, в которых уже завязался разговор — испуганный притворщик наверняка попытается спрятаться за чужие спины... Это все, что я знаю, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}".

traits.locale_text: "By the way they talk, by their lack of restraint — the unfamiliar delicacies overwhelm them so much that they lose control. Impostors are often scared of the responsibility that has fallen on their weak shoulders, and they try to stay close to the real nobles and imitate their rarefied manners. During the hunt, it is most worthwhile to pay attention to separate groups where conversation has already started — a frightened impostor will probably try to hide behind other people's backs... That's all I know, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

"By the way they talk, by the intemperance... The unfamiliar sensations overwhelm them so much that they lose control. What else? Some of them become remarkably... Violent, to the point of abusing the servants. I think this is their way of taking revenge for the harm done to them, because they borrow not only the costumes but also the powers of the nobility for the duration of the festivities. The rabble often mistake freedom for lack of punishment."

languages.text: “通过他们说话的方式，以及缺乏涵养的行为……他们突然得到了不属于他们的美味佳肴，很快就会失去克制。那些冒牌货过于软弱，惧怕落在肩膀上的责任。此外，他们还会刻意接近真正的贵族，模仿他们优雅的举止。狩猎期间，您需要格外留意那些已经开始交谈的人们，因为那些满心惶恐的冒牌货可能会混在人群之中……我知道的只有这些了，来自上界的大人。”
languages.original_text: "By the way they talk, by their lack of restraint — the unfamiliar delicacies overwhelm them so much that they lose control. Impostors are often scared of the responsibility that has fallen on their weak shoulders, and they try to stay close to the real nobles and imitate their rarefied manners. During the hunt, it is most worthwhile to pay attention to separate groups where conversation has already started — a frightened impostor will probably try to hide behind other people's backs... That's all I know, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: “通过他们说话的方式，以及缺乏涵养的行为……他们突然得到了不属于他们的美味佳肴，很快就会失去克制。那些冒牌货过于软弱，惧怕落在肩膀上的责任。此外，他们还会刻意接近真正的贵族，模仿他们优雅的举止。狩猎期间，您需要格外留意那些已经开始交谈的人们，因为那些满心惶恐的冒牌货可能会混在人群之中……我知道的只有这些了，来自上界的大人。”

languages.text: «Por su forma de hablar, o la falta de decoro; están tan poco habituados a los suculentos manjares de la fiesta que les cuesta controlarse. Los impostores suelen temer la responsabilidad que recae sobre sus débiles hombros, y procuran no alejarse demasiado de los verdaderos nobles para imitar sus afectaciones. Durante la caza, merece la pena prestar atención a los grupos aislados que ya hayan entablado una conversación; un impostor asustado intentará ocultarse detrás de otras personas... No se me ocurre nada más, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial».
languages.original_text: "By the way they talk, by their lack of restraint — the unfamiliar delicacies overwhelm them so much that they lose control. Impostors are often scared of the responsibility that has fallen on their weak shoulders, and they try to stay close to the real nobles and imitate their rarefied manners. During the hunt, it is most worthwhile to pay attention to separate groups where conversation has already started — a frightened impostor will probably try to hide behind other people's backs... That's all I know, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

Durante la caza, merece la pena prestar atención a los grupos aislados que ya hayan entablado una conversación; un impostor asustado intentará ocultarse detrás de otras personas... No se me ocurre nada más, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial».

languages.text: "Konuşma tarzlarından, lakayıtlıklarından... Alışmadıkları lezzetler onları öyle bunaltır ki kontrollerini kaybederler. Taklitçiler genellikle zayıf omuzlarına binen sorumluluklardan korkar ve gerçek soylulara yakın durmaya, onların ender görülen tavırlarını taklit etmeye çalışır. Av sırasında, insanların birbirleriyle sohbet ettiği gruplara dikkat etmek çok önemlidir. Korkmuş taklitçiler muhtemelen başkalarının arasına saklanmaya çalışacaktır... Bildiğim tek şey bu Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}."
languages.original_text: "By the way they talk, by their lack of restraint — the unfamiliar delicacies overwhelm them so much that they lose control. Impostors are often scared of the responsibility that has fallen on their weak shoulders, and they try to stay close to the real nobles and imitate their rarefied manners. During the hunt, it is most worthwhile to pay attention to separate groups where conversation has already started — a frightened impostor will probably try to hide behind other people's backs... That's all I know, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: "Konuşma tarzlarından, lakayıtlıklarından... Alışmadıkları lezzetler onları öyle bunaltır ki kontrollerini kaybederler. Taklitçiler genellikle zayıf omuzlarına binen sorumluluklardan korkar ve gerçek soylulara yakın durmaya, onların ender görülen tavırlarını taklit etmeye çalışır. Av sırasında, insanların birbirleriyle sohbet ettiği gruplara dikkat etmek çok önemlidir. Korkmuş taklitçiler muhtemelen başkalarının arasına saklanmaya çalışacaktır... Bildiğim tek şey bu Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}."

languages.text: 「話し方や落ち着き、不慣れなご馳走にとても圧倒されるので、コントロールができなくなります。偽者は、自分の弱い肩に降りかかった責任を恐れるものです。だから本物の貴族たちの近くに寄って、その洗練された振る舞いを真似しようとするのです。狩りの最中には、すでに会話が始まっている個別のグループに注目するのが最も有効です。怯えた偽者は、おそらく他人の背後に隠れようとするでしょう…私が知っているのは、そのくらいです。天の{mf|君|姫}」
languages.original_text: "By the way they talk, by their lack of restraint — the unfamiliar delicacies overwhelm them so much that they lose control. Impostors are often scared of the responsibility that has fallen on their weak shoulders, and they try to stay close to the real nobles and imitate their rarefied manners. During the hunt, it is most worthwhile to pay attention to separate groups where conversation has already started — a frightened impostor will probably try to hide behind other people's backs... That's all I know, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: 「話し方や落ち着き、不慣れなご馳走にとても圧倒されるので、コントロールができなくなります。偽者は、自分の弱い肩に降りかかった責任を恐れるものです。だから本物の貴族たちの近くに寄って、その洗練された振る舞いを真似しようとするのです。狩りの最中には、すでに会話が始まっている個別のグループに注目するのが最も有効です。怯えた偽者は、おそらく他人の背後に隠れようとするでしょう…私が知っているのは、そのくらいです。天の{mf|君|姫}」

languages.text: « Par leur façon de parler, leur manque total de retenue... Ils sont tellement fascinés par ces mets qui leur sont inconnus qu'ils perdent tout contrôle. Les imposteurs ont souvent peur des responsabilités qui pèsent sur leurs frêles épaules, et ils font tout pour rester proches de la vraie noblesse et imiter ses manières. Lors de la chasse, il faut surtout faire attention aux groupes séparés déjà plongés en grande conversation... Un imposteur effrayé aura plutôt tendance à se cacher derrière d'autres personnes. C'est tout ce que je sais, votre Céleste Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "By the way they talk, by their lack of restraint — the unfamiliar delicacies overwhelm them so much that they lose control. Impostors are often scared of the responsibility that has fallen on their weak shoulders, and they try to stay close to the real nobles and imitate their rarefied manners. During the hunt, it is most worthwhile to pay attention to separate groups where conversation has already started — a frightened impostor will probably try to hide behind other people's backs... That's all I know, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: « Par leur façon de parler, leur manque total de retenue... Ils sont tellement fascinés par ces mets qui leur sont inconnus qu'ils perdent tout contrôle. Les imposteurs ont souvent peur des responsabilités qui pèsent sur leurs frêles épaules, et ils font tout pour rester proches de la vraie noblesse et imiter ses manières. Lors de la chasse, il faut surtout faire attention aux groupes séparés déjà plongés en grande conversation... Un imposteur effrayé aura plutôt tendance à se cacher derrière d'autres personnes. C'est tout ce que je sais, votre Céleste Seigneurie. »

languages.text: "Ihre Ausdrucksweise, ihr Mangel an Mäßigung – die unbekannten Köstlichkeiten überwältigen sie derart, dass sie die Beherrschung verlieren. Hochstapler haben oft Angst vor der Verantwortung, die auf ihren schwachen Schultern liegt, und suchen die Nähe der echten Adligen und imitieren deren vornehme Manieren. Während der Jagd lohnt es sich meist, auf einzelne Gruppen zu achten, in denen das Gespräch bereits begonnen hat – ein verängstigter Hochstapler versucht oft, sich hinter dem Rücken anderer zu verstecken ... Mehr weiß ich nicht, {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}."
languages.original_text: "By the way they talk, by their lack of restraint — the unfamiliar delicacies overwhelm them so much that they lose control. Impostors are often scared of the responsibility that has fallen on their weak shoulders, and they try to stay close to the real nobles and imitate their rarefied manners. During the hunt, it is most worthwhile to pay attention to separate groups where conversation has already started — a frightened impostor will probably try to hide behind other people's backs... That's all I know, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}."

traits.locale_text: "Ihre Ausdrucksweise, ihr Mangel an Mäßigung – die unbekannten Köstlichkeiten überwältigen sie derart, dass sie die Beherrschung verlieren. Hochstapler haben oft Angst vor der Verantwortung, die auf ihren schwachen Schultern liegt, und suchen die Nähe der echten Adligen und imitieren deren vornehme Manieren. Während der Jagd lohnt es sich meist, auf einzelne Gruppen zu achten, in denen das Gespräch bereits begonnen hat – ein verängstigter Hochstapler versucht oft, sich hinter dem Rücken anderer zu verstecken ... Mehr weiß ich nicht, {mf|himmlischer Herr|himmlische Herrin}."
